newsitem.title: POLAND: Efekt cuts '96 net profit forecast.
newsitem.headline: Efekt cuts '96 net profit forecast.

text.p: Polish trader Efekt SA said on Friday it expects to make a net profit this year of 1.9 million zlotys, sharply below the 3.5 million zlotys it predicted last March.

Efekt said in a statement the main reasons for the poorer results included a failed 14.5-million-zloty sugar contract, a weaker-than- expected Polish commodities market, low-profit foreign trade and a delay in starting operations in neighbouring Ukraine.
The firm said it would make a pre-tax profit of 3.2 million zlotys on 18.3 million zlotys in sales this year, down from the 5.9 million zlotys on 27.5 million in sales predicted in March.
Efekt has netted 1.6 million zlotys in the first 10 months of the year, on a pre-tax profit of 2.8 million zlotys and sales of 14.9 million zlotys.
